mapper.update: update t_user set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_NO = #{roleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, USERNAME, NICKNAME, PASSWORD, ROLE_NO, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER from t_user where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, USERNAME, NICKNAME, PASSWORD, ROLE_NO, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER from t_user
